name: Anonymous Music Bot
description: A Powerful Telegram Music Bot written in Python with Pyrogram and Py-Tgcalls.

BOT_TOKEN.description: Get bot token from BotFather on Telegram

DURATION_LIMIT.description: Duration Limit for Playout (In Mins).. Example: 60

SUPPORT_CHANNEL.description: Your Support Channel Link if you have any, Leave it as it is if you don't have any. Your link must start with https://t.me/

SUPPORT_GROUP.description: Support Group Link if you have any, Leave blank if no support. Your link must start with https://t.me/

OWNER_ID.description: The user id of user who will be the Owner of the bot. If there are more than one seperate them with space.

STRING_SESSION.description: Pyrogram String Session of your account who will be the assistant of the bot.

LOG_GROUP_ID.description: Your Log Group ID, add your bot and promote as an admin with full rights!. Use only group ID,(Don't use Channel ID).

SUDO_USERS.description: The user id of user who will be the Sudo users of the bot. If there are more than one seperate them with space.
